name: NSManagedObjectID
desc: A compact, universal identifier for a managed object.

items.name: var entity: NSEntityDescription
items.desc: The entity description associated with the object ID.

items.name: var isTemporaryID: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the object ID is temporary.

items.name: var persistentStore: NSPersistentStore?
items.desc: The persistent store that fetched the object for the object ID.

items.name: func uriRepresentation() -> URL
items.desc: Returns a URI that provides an archiveable reference to the object for the object ID.
